item.dc:creator: andyauthor
item.content:encoded: [vc_row css=".vc_custom_1443400812394{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;}"][vc_column][vcex_portfolio_grid grid_style="masonry" posts_per_page="-1" thumb_link="lightbox" overlay_style="magnifying-hover" img_hover_style="grow" content_heading_weight="normal" excerpt="false" read_more="false" content_alignment="center" img_width="600" img_height="9999" content_heading_size="16px" content_background="#ffffff" content_padding="15px 20px 10px 20px" content_border="0px"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: About
item.dc:creator: andyauthor
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1443403176835{margin-bottom: 60px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_single_image image="55"][vcex_spacing size="45px"][vc_text_separator title="My History" css=".vc_custom_1443402833048{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"][vc_column_text]

I headlined my first solo show at age 22, fresh out of college and full of inspiration. I was granted a scholarship at 18 to pursue my passion as a career. I've started creating since age 2 when I got my hands on pens and paper. But I've been an artist since I was born.

[/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing][vc_single_image image="56"][vcex_spacing size="45px"][vc_text_separator title="My Work" css=".vc_custom_1443403016450{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"][vc_column_text]

I create mostly with acrylic and canvas, but also work in various other media. Everything is handcrafted our of my home/studio/office.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Contact
item.dc:creator: andyauthor
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_single_image image="53" img_size="9999x750"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row column_spacing="60" css=".vc_custom_1443403183460{margin-bottom: 60px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]You can contact me at the email listed, or via any of my social media profiles. I do create custom pieces. Just contact me for an estimate - prices do vary based on the size of the work, as does completion.

I'm also frequently struck with inspiration, in which case you'll want to follow me on Twitter to see when my next pop-up art installation will take place. Everything is one of a kind, for sale and profits go to support a starving artist (that's me).[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_text_separator title="Inquiries" css=".vc_custom_1443402579197{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1546192736159{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"]

thelefty@wpexplorer.com

[/vc_column_text][vc_text_separator title="Follow Me" css=".vc_custom_1443402676174{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"][vcex_social_links social_links="%5B%7B%22site%22%3A%22twitter%22%2C%22link%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2F%22%7D%2C%7B%22site%22%3A%22facebook%22%2C%22link%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fwww.facebook.com%2F%22%7D%2C%7B%22site%22%3A%22googleplus%22%2C%22link%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fplus.google.com%2F%22%7D%2C%7B%22site%22%3A%22pinterest%22%2C%22link%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fwww.pinterest.com%2F%22%7D%2C%7B%22site%22%3A%22dribbble%22%2C%22link%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fdribbble.com%2F%22%7D%2C%7B%22site%22%3A%22instagram%22%2C%22link%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Finstagram.com%2F%22%7D%5D" link_target="blank" style="flat-color-rounded" align="center" twitter="https://twitter.com/" facebook="https://www.facebook.com/" googleplus="https://plus.google.com/" pinterest="https://www.pinterest.com/" dribbble="https://dribbble.com/" instagram="https://instagram.com/" tumblr="https://www.tumblr.com/" size="24px"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
